basics.name: Vishwajeet Karmarkar
basics.label: Roboticist
basics.summary: I am pursuing a M.S in Mechanical Engineering & Robotics at Northwestern University. My thesis is in assitive robotics under Dr Brenna Argall at the Argall Lab.

highlights:
Built a ROS package that accepts tool paths from a CAM soft-
        ware and performs sheet metal forming using a UR5 robot
Using MoveIt and OMPL for path planning. Completed simulation in Gazebo, with ongoing lab work on the real robot
Devised a perception pipeline to locate doorways for an intelligent wheelchair by exploring deep-learning paradigms
Trained Mask-RCNN to generate door masks and estimated door locations (in real-time) using these masks and point-clouds
Tested semantic segmentation using Point-Net trained on a Stanford Dataset; found it unusable for real-time goal inference

Redeveloped parts of wheelchair codebase (100k+ lines, C++), implementing proper version control and improving readability; collaborated with a team of 7 graduate students loosely following Agile development methods
Saved the company $45k by developing 15 Data Acquisition System prototypes for the companyâ€™s electric scooter fleet
Wrote C code for Arduino to filter, convert, and collect data from sensors used in the DAQ
Coded Python scripts to broadcast data to an AWS cloud database for real-time vehicle visibility, with features to prevent data-loss
Handled circuit design, CAD modeling, component sourcing, and 3D printing of enclosures for the DAQ devices
Managed warehouse inventory worth $200K using FIFO
Managed a team of 40 delivery vans and 100 delivery staff to ensure smooth operations and timely service to 4500 customers
Led fieldwork to optimize delivery routes; reduced fleet by 8%
Manufactured carbon-fiber composites; delivered 50+ parts for products such as wind turbines, racecar bodyworks, and drones
Managed company performance and finances to stay profitable, with a margin of 45%
Built a CNC 'Filament Winding Machine' at 32% cost of alternatives in the market; used it to supply carbon fiber tubes
